mapper.select: SELECT empNum, empName, workPart, empBirth, salary, endDate, empPhone, salaryDay, empClass, storeId FROM employees WHERE empName = #{empmName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (empNum, empName, workPart, empBirth, hireDate, salary, endDate, empPhone, salaryDay, empClass, storeId) VALUES ((employees_seq.nextval), #{empName}, #{workPart}, #{empBirth}, #{hireDate}, #{salary}, (SELECT sysdate + (INTERVAL '10' YEAR) FROM dual), #{empPhone}, #{salaryDay}, #{empClass}, #{storeId})
mapper.select: SELECT empNum, empName, workPart, to_char(empBirth,'YY-MM-DD'), to_char(hireDate,'YY-MM-DD'), salary, to_char(endDate,'YY-MM-DD'), empPhone, to_char(salaryDay,'YY-MM-DD'), empClass, storeId FROM employees ORDER BY hireDate
